-1.title: Lauren Fix Discusses the Need for Extra Scrutiny on Tesla Fire and Crashes
-1.plot: The Car Coach discusses the need for extra scrutiny on Tesla fire and crashes, Harley Davidson facing fines for selling aftermarket devices that cause too much pollution to be emitted, lawyers alleging Bosch helped Volkswagen in the emission fraud, and...

imdb.plot outline: "The Hard Line" with Ed Berliner-a hard-hitting, fast-paced hour of television that takes viewers on a search for the real story behind the headlines. Host Ed Berliner asks the questions viewers want answered and isn't satisfied with just a part of the story-he wants his viewers to know it all. Tune in to The Hard Line for an in depth look at the stories everybody is talking about. The Hard Line airs 9PM ET/6PM PT only on Newsmax TV!
imdb.title: The Hard Line
plot: "_The Hard Line_ (qv)" with Ed Berliner-a hard-hitting, fast-paced hour of television that takes viewers on a search for the real story behind the headlines. Host Ed Berliner asks the questions viewers want answered and isn't satisfied with just a part of the story-he wants his viewers to know it all. Tune in to _The Hard Line_ (qv) for an in depth look at the stories everybody is talking about. _The Hard Line_ (qv) airs 9PM ET/6PM PT only on _News_ (qv)max TV!::Ed Berliner
